TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies the paper tray from which the printer gets paper.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get the paper source trays that are available on the printer and to set the paper source for a page, respectively.
For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
## Examples The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources. The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box. The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
[!code-cs[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.printin_6_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.printin_6_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.printin_6_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> class.
|Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>|

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the integer representing one of the values or a custom value.
Docs.value: The integer value representing one of the values or a custom value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows integer value for each <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> member. Anything larger than 256 maps to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> enumeration, but the RawKind property returns the actual integer value.
|Integer value|PaperSourceKind member| |-------------------|----------------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>| |256 or larger|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>|

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the paper source.
Docs.value: The name of the paper source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call this property when the paper source needs to be displayed. The name of the paper source is generated based upon the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A> property.
## Examples The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources. The SourceName is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box. The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
[!code-cs[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.drawing.printin_22_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.drawing.printin_22_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.drawing.printin_22_1.vb)]
